params.1319:
Skotizo is a demonic boss located beneath the Catacombs of Kourend.

Accessing his lair requires the use of a dark totem on the altar found in the centre of the Catacombs.

Attack Styles - Melee, Magic
Immunities - Poison, Venom
Slayer categories - Black Demon, Greater Demon.
params.1320:
Mandatory requirements:
- A Dark Totem

Combat Achievement task difficulty:
- Medium
- Hard
- Elite
- Master
